definitions.definition: Not rational ; unfounded , nonsensical or wrong-headed .
Of a real number , that cannot be written as the ratio of two integers .
definitions.label_groups: mathematics , arithmetic , number theory , not comparable

main_definition: Not rational ; unfounded , nonsensical or wrong-headed .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics , arithmetic , number theory , not comparable ) Of a real number , that cannot be written as the ratio of two integers .
